Great burgers - one of the best I can remember. Great caramelisation on the outside and cooked to order so pink and juicy. Sides were delicious and come in 2 sizes depending on your appetite. Prices are v.reasonable c.6-9 € and come with a great choice of fixings. Staff are extremely friendly and service is fast. All burgers are made on the day and from beef certified to be 'Eusko label' so guaranteed fed with natural forage. Which will be why they are so yummy then!
